title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XIX, pt. 421 - Standards For Safeguarding Customer Information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XIX, pt. 421 - Standards For Safeguarding Customer Information

State Regulations

General Provisions (§ 421.0 to 421.3)

Development and Implementation of Information Security Program (§ 421.4 to 421.8)

Additional Provisions (§ 421.9 to 421.10)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XIX, pt. 421

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301; art. 24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
